label: Distance to nearest neighbour habitat patch
definition: Distance to nearest neighbour habitat patch to measure the degree of connection of EUNIS habitats within a landscape. https://github.com/EuropaBON/EBV-Descriptions/wiki/Terrestrial-Connectivity-of-terrestrial-ecosystem-habitat-types
